issue.title: [CF 482] Condition: Combo points bugged
issue.body:
I have been reluctant recently to post new tickets, seeing the number of open tickets. However this bug is kinda major if you are playing a rogue.

I have built a couple of icons for finishing moves on my rogue, namely recuperate, rupture and slice and dice. They all share the condition Combo Points, Target = 5. Whenever I reach 5 combopoints these should all simultaneously fire. Instead what I get seems completely random. Some fire some don't. Sometimes they just lag 2 seconds. Sometimes Slice and Dice only appears after Recuperate on myself has faded or vice versa. I've even seen an icon show when I didn't even have 5 combopoints on the target.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #482 | Raw
